text: Gustáv Mráz (born 11 September 1934) is a former Slovak football player. He played for the Czechoslovakia national team in 11 matches. == References == * Category:1934 births Category:Slovak footballers Category:Czechoslovak footballers Category:1958 FIFA World Cup players Category:Czechoslovakia international footballers Category:FK Inter Bratislava players Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders
title: Gustáv Mráz
